generate_title.template:
Write a title for the review below:
===
{{review_body}} |||
{{review_title}}

prompt_title_to_star.template:
Rate the product by the number of stars based on the review title below: (1 being the lowest and 5 the highest)
===
{{review_title}} |||
{{answer_choices[stars-1]}}

prompt_review_to_star.template:
Rate the product by the number of stars based on the review body below: (1 being the lowest and 5 the highest)
===
{{review_body}} |||
{{answer_choices[stars-1]}}

prompt_body_title_to_star.template:
Rate the product by the number of stars based on the review below: (1 being the lowest and 5 the highest)
===
{{review_title}}. {{review_body}} |||
{{answer_choices[stars-1]}}

prompt_review_to_category.template:
Guess the product category from the following review:
===
{{review_body}} |||
{{product_category}}

prompt_body_title_category_to_star.template:
Rate the product by the number of stars based on the review below: (1 being the lowest and 5 the highest)
===
{{review_title}}. {{review_body}} Product category: {{product_category}}|||
{{answer_choices[stars-1]}}

prompt_title_to_product_category.template:
Guess the product category from the review title below:
===
{{review_title}} |||
{{product_category}}
